intro: Manglietia yuyuanensis, commonly known as the Yuyuan manglietia, is a rare evergreen tree native to China. It belongs to the family Magnoliaceae and is characterized by its large, fragrant, white flowers that bloom in spring. The plant has simple, alternate leaves that are elliptical in shape and have a smooth surface. It is typically found in humid, shaded environments within mountainous regions. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered an endangered species.
